posts._title: Vojislav Nanovic – Cudotvorni mac AKA The Magic Sword (1950)
posts.title: Cudotvorni mac
posts.excerpt: Quote:Movie contains elements from Serbian fairytale “Bas Celik” (means “Head of steel”) but has it’s own plot that, although follows standard patterns of fairy tales, is original in it’s presentation. The final battle can be seen as a fairytale version of the First Serbian Uprising, and Bas Celik as a metaphor for Ottoman empire.
